name: Ichibu Date~❤️!
description:
Synopsis

You're trying to get a cute girlfriend, but you only have one minute in this arcade-style game to score her! You will need to take selfies, gain helpful items and even dine in restaurants to achieve your goal!

🎃 Pumpkin Pie is a speciality in this city. Eating it gives you a speed boost!

Information

Made in under 48 hours for One Minute Game Jam #8. Certain features have been glossed over or skipped due to time-constraints. There are currently five girls: Kristen, Jenny, Cali, Melanie and the mysterious Brooke.

F5 to toggle fullscreen. F6 to change window size.
